actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act to increase the size of the board of directors thereof.

summary.text: Amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act to increase from 15 to 19 the membership of the board of directors of the Federal National Mortgage Association. Classifies the Federal National Mortgage Association as an agency for purposes of specified administrative procedures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act to increase the size of the board of directors thereof.
